projects.title: 404 Page Challenge

projects.description: A simple project replicating the look of address finder.

projects.description: A simple project replicating the look of announcement card.

projects.description: A simple project replicating the look of an apps component.

projects.title: Colored Cards Challenge
projects.description: Simple set of cards, that generate a set of random pastel colors on click. Responsive flexbox.

projects.description: Simple card with social media links that is able to switch between dark/light modes and stores preference in localstorage.

projects.title: Notifications Card Challenge
projects.description: Card displaying custom memo posts. Max 3 at a time, posts dissapear with time.

projects.description: A button with a custom 'lighthouse-like' animation of the border.
